Description: With the 'Choose Later' option, you have the flexibility to add your payout details privately. Select from our extensive payout methods. After your offer is inspected, we'll send a link to your email, allowing you to choose your preferred payout option at your convenience.
Here are the methods available to you based on your offer that you can choose from later:

FormPayoutPaperCheck.UseCompanyName: Use the company name in the Check

FormCheckoutAccount.SmsBroadcastDescription: By signing up via text , you consent to receive automated text messages about your offer (e.g. status updates and cart reminders) from {:company-name} at the number provided. Consent is not mandatory. Message & data rates may apply. Unsubscribe at any time by replying STOP.
